Package pl.lib.config

Class GroupDefinition.Builder

java.lang.Object
pl.lib.config.GroupDefinition.Builder
Enclosing class:
GroupDefinition
public static class GroupDefinition.Builder extends Object
Builder for GroupDefinition class implementing Builder pattern.

Enables step-by-step building of GroupDefinition object with optional fields.
